entry.title: $2299 // Prime Bedford-Stuyvesant Location with No Fee
entry.content:
For the most up to date information, visit: https://viewlistings.com/c/posts/2y4p

Live in this gorgeous 2 bed 1 bath in prime clinton hill!

Apartment Features:

- Laundry In Building
- Recently Renovated
- Sunny Apartment
- Brand New Appliances
- Central Air And Heat
- Very Nice Common Space
- Stainless Steel Appliances
- Video Intercom Buzzer
- Exposed Brick

Live near the A,C ,S and G trains. Nightlife, Restaurants, supermarkets and more nearby. The popular Fulton ave where you can shop conveniently is just a few blocks away.

-No brokers fee, Just 1st, 1 month security.
-Guarantors are welcome
Call, Text or email Izzy to schedule a viewing today.
